title: Math.hypot()
description: The `Math.hypot()` static JS method returns the square root of the sum of squares of its arguments.
content: The static method that returns the square root of the sum of squares of its arguments. Itâ€™s useful for calculating the Euclidean distance, for example, `Math.hypot(3, 4)` returns 5, which is the length of the hypotenuse in a right triangle.
